entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Eskasoni
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:40 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Eskasoni (First Nations) 12:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Temperature: -0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: NE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few rain showers or flurries beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 4 this evening. Forecast issued 8:30 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow changing to snow in the morning. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:30 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 8:30 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 8:30 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023
